name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Introduction to the fundamental principles of rocket propulsion and its importance in space exploration.

lessons.name: Types of Rocket Engines
lessons.description: Exploration of different types of rocket engines and their applications in space travel.

lessons.name: Rocket Propellant Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of the chemistry behind rocket propellants and their combustion reactions.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Types of Rocket Fuels
lessons.description: Exploration of various rocket fuels, including liquid hydrogen, kerosene, and solid propellants.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Study of the combustion processes in rocket engines and the release of energy.

lessons.name: Efficiency and Thrust
lessons.description: Analysis of the efficiency and thrust generation in rocket engines.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Geometry
lessons.description: Exploration of nozzle geometry and its impact on propellant acceleration.

lessons.name: Thrust Vector Control
lessons.description: Understanding thrust vector control mechanisms in rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Optimizing Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Techniques for optimizing nozzle performance for different mission profiles.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces
lessons.description: Introduction to aerodynamic forces, including lift and drag.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Exploration of fluid dynamics and its relevance in aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Study of aerodynamic behaviors in subsonic flow conditions.

lessons.name: Supersonic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Analysis of aerodynamic behaviors in supersonic flow conditions.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Reentry
lessons.description: Understanding heat transfer during spacecraft reentry into the Earth's atmosphere.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Exploration of thermal protection systems to withstand aerodynamic heating.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Introduction to materials used in spacecraft structural design.

lessons.name: Load Analysis
lessons.description: Analysis of structural loads and their impact on spacecraft design.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws of Planetary Motion
lessons.description: Exploration of Kepler's laws and their application to understanding planetary motion.

lessons.name: Orbit Determination
lessons.description: Study of methods for determining and predicting the orbits of celestial bodies.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Process
lessons.description: Introduction to the systems engineering process for spacecraft development.

lessons.name: Subsystems Integration
lessons.description: Integration of spacecraft subsystems to ensure proper functionality.
